snippet: Consumers need a clearer picture of costs to make rational decisions about medical care.
abstract: Editorial welcomes federal government making public a vast trove of information on list prices charged by hospitals for array of procedures commonly performed on hospitalized patients, but contends that it falls short of providing full information that patients need to make informed decisions about their health care.
lead_paragraph: Consumers need a clearer picture of costs to make rational decisions about medical care.

headline.seo: The Murky World of Hospital Prices
headline.main: The Murky World of Hospital Prices
headline.print_headline: The Murky World of Hospital Prices
